name: Bomboozle Jam
description:
Andex Presents: Bomboozle Jam!

Bonzai wants to kick back, relax, and have a good time with his girls but there is a sniper on the loose. Help Bonzai bomboozle the sniper and hang out with as many girls as possible.

Website: http://andex.sh

Instructions:

For Linux running x86-64:

Note: pyinstaller and pygame seem to have issues exporting to AMD GPU's. If this does not work and you are running AMD then try running the game from source.

  • Download bomboozle-jam-x86-64.zip
  • unzip bomboozle-jam-x86-64.zip
  • cd bomboozle-jam
  • ./bomboozle-jam

For other platforms/architectures:

  • Download bomboozle-jam-src.zip
  • unzip bomboozle-jam-src.zip
  • cd bomboozle-jam
  • Install pygame (pip install pygame or apt install python3-pygame)
  • python game.py

Alternate download: http://andex.sh/downloads/bomboozle-jam-x86-64.zip
